originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

originalTitle: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
title: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
content: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting bribes from industry figures interested in Nigerian government contracts, a court in London has heard.

originalTitle: Rwanda seeks £100m from UK over axed asylum deal
title: Rwanda seeks £100m from UK over axed asylum deal
content: The African nation argues it is owed payments but the Home Office says it will fight the case.

originalTitle: Tech giant ASML announces record orders in boost for AI boom
title: Tech giant ASML announces record orders in boost for AI boom
content: Dutch firm says it expects strong growth in 2026, countering fears of an investment bubble.

originalTitle: Israel’s attacks on Gaza fertility clinics shatter dreams of parenthood
title: Israel’s attacks on Gaza fertility clinics shatter dreams of parenthood
content: Israel's war has devastated enclave's reproductive health system; advocates call it a genocidal measure.

originalTitle: At least three people killed in Russian attacks on Ukraine
title: At least three people killed in Russian attacks on Ukraine
content: Russia used an Iskander-M ballistic missile and 146 drones in its attacks, according to Ukraine's air force.

originalTitle: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
title: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
content: The killing of Alex Pretti over the weekend led Minnesota officials and locals to renew calls for Trump to end his immigration operation there.

originalTitle: 'I don't let bullies win': US congresswoman Omar defiant after substance thrown at her
title: 'I don't let bullies win': US congresswoman Omar defiant after substance thrown at her
content: The Minnesota Democrat was uninjured and continued to speak at her event, after being sprayed with an unidentified liquid.

originalTitle: Zelensky condemns Russian drone strike that killed five on passenger train
title: Zelensky condemns Russian drone strike that killed five on passenger train
content: Drones targeted a packed train in north-eastern Ukraine, officials say.

originalTitle: Six English clubs, one huge night - all to play for in Champions League
title: Six English clubs, one huge night - all to play for in Champions League
content: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?

originalTitle: Ward-Prowse set for West Ham departure after not playing under Nuno
title: Ward-Prowse set for West Ham departure after not playing under Nuno
content: West Ham midfielder James Ward-Prowse is expected to undergo a medical with Burnley on Wednesday as he closes in on a loan move.

originalTitle: Forest goalkeeper Victor ruled out for rest of season
title: Forest goalkeeper Victor ruled out for rest of season
content: Nottingham Forest goalkeeper John Victor is ruled out for the rest of the season with a knee injury.
